caption.p: Zika virus infection down modulates the growth of cultured human thymic epithelial cells. TECs were infected with ZIKV (MOI = 1) and the ( a) numbers of cells in culture were detected 24, 48 and 72 hours post-infection (hpi). Each time point represents the mean ± SEM (n = 3). ( b) Percentage of apoptotic cells (annexin-V +PI −) detected by flow cytometry 24, 48 and 72 hpi. Each time point represents the mean ± SEM (n = 3) ( c) Percentage of Ki67 high + cells detected by flow cytometry 24, 48 and 72 hpi. Values represent the mean ± SEM (n = 3). **p < 0.01, ***p < 0.001 (unpaired t-test).
